basics.name: Baybarshan Ekiz
basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: 7+ years of expertise in DevOps Engineering within high-compliance industries like Banking and Government. I architect scalable, resilient infrastructure using Kubernetes (CKA Certified) and GitOps workflows across Hybrid and Multi-Cloud landscapes (Azure, AWS, GCP, Huawei Cloud, Hetzner, DigitalOcean). Standardizing CI/CD pipelines and provisioning infrastructure as code using Terraform, Ansible, and Helm. Implementing robust DevSecOps strategies, secret management, and traffic control (NGINX/HAProxy) backed by an academic background in Cyber Security.
